title: RBI increases repo rate by 25 basis points to combat inflation
content: The Reserve Bank of India raised the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.75% in a move to control rising inflation. Governor stated that inflation remains above the target range and monetary policy needs to remain restrictive.

title: Reserve Bank hikes interest rates by 0.25%
content: In a surprise move, RBI increased the policy rate by 25 bps citing persistent inflation pressures. The decision came after retail inflation stayed above 6% for three consecutive months.

title: Central bank raises repo rate to 6.75%
content: Reserve Bank of India announced a 25 basis point hike in the repo rate to 6.75%, signaling a hawkish stance on inflation control. Banking stocks fell on the news.

title: HDFC Bank announces 15% dividend and stock buyback
content: HDFC Bank's board approved a dividend of Rs 19 per share, representing a 15% payout. Additionally, the bank announced a buyback program worth Rs 10,000 crore.

title: ICICI Bank opens 500 new branches across tier-2 cities
content: ICICI Bank announced the opening of 500 new branches across tier-2 and tier-3 cities as part of its expansion strategy.

title: Banking sector NPAs decline to 5-year low
content: Non-performing assets in the Indian banking sector have declined to their lowest level in five years at 3.2%. Credit growth stands at 16%, driven by retail and MSME lending.

title: TCS wins $2 billion digital transformation deal
content: Tata Consultancy Services secured a massive $2 billion contract from a European retail giant for digital transformation services spanning 5 years.

title: Infosys Q3 results beat estimates, revenue up 18%
content: Infosys reported strong Q3 results with revenue growing 18% YoY to Rs 38,500 crore. The company raised its FY guidance to 16-17%.

title: Reliance Industries plans Rs 75,000 crore green energy investment
content: Reliance Industries announced plans to invest Rs 75,000 crore in renewable energy over the next 3 years focusing on solar and green hydrogen.

title: Maruti Suzuki launches new SUV, expects 20% sales growth
content: Maruti Suzuki unveiled its latest SUV model priced at Rs 12.5 lakh. The company expects the new launch to drive 20% sales growth in Q4.

title: SEBI introduces new regulations for AI trading systems
content: Securities and Exchange Board of India announced new guidelines for algorithmic and AI-based trading systems to ensure market stability.

title: Nifty Bank index hits all-time high on strong Q3 earnings
content: The Nifty Bank index surged to a record high of 45,800, driven by better-than-expected Q3 earnings from major banks.

title: Sun Pharma receives USFDA approval for generic drug
content: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries received approval from the US FDA for its generic version of a blockbuster medication with annual US sales of $1.2 billion.

title: Pharmaceutical sector rallies on export growth prospects
content: Indian pharmaceutical stocks rallied as export data showed 22% growth in the sector. Increased demand from US and European markets drove the surge.

title: Tata Motors electric vehicle sales surge 150% YoY
content: Tata Motors reported a 150% year-on-year increase in electric vehicle sales, selling 48,000 EVs in the quarter. The company aims to launch 5 new EV models next year.

title: Adani Green Energy secures 2 GW solar project
content: Adani Green Energy won a 2 gigawatt solar power project worth Rs 12,000 crore. The project will be commissioned over 18 months.

title: IT sector hiring picks up 35% in November
content: Indian IT sector hiring surged 35% in November compared to the previous month, led by demand in cloud, AI, and cybersecurity roles.

title: Asian Paints launches new premium product line
content: Asian Paints introduced a premium range of eco-friendly paints targeting the luxury home segment with prices 30% higher than regular products.

title: Zomato reports first profitable quarter, shares jump 12%
content: Food delivery platform Zomato posted its first quarterly profit of Rs 36 crore. The stock surged 12% on the news reaching a 52-week high.

title: Coal India plans to reduce carbon emissions by 40%
content: Coal India announced a comprehensive plan to cut carbon emissions by 40% by 2030 through adoption of clean coal technologies and renewable energy.

title: Bajaj Auto electric scooter bookings cross 1 lakh
content: Bajaj Auto's new electric scooter received over 1 lakh bookings within 48 hours of launch, indicating strong consumer demand for EVs.

title: SBI reports 15% growth in home loan disbursements
content: State Bank of India witnessed 15% YoY growth in home loan disbursements driven by festive season demand and competitive interest rates.

title: Wipro bags multi-year cloud deal from US healthcare firm
content: Wipro secured a 5-year cloud transformation contract worth $500 million from a leading US healthcare provider.

title: Dr Reddy's launches generic version of cancer drug
content: Dr Reddy's Laboratories launched the generic version of a key cancer treatment drug in India, priced 60% lower than the original.

title: Mahindra & Mahindra SUV sales hit record high
content: Mahindra & Mahindra's SUV sales reached an all-time monthly high of 42,000 units in November driven by strong demand for Scorpio and XUV models.

title: HDFC Life Insurance IPO subscription 2.5x on day 1
content: HDFC Life Insurance's IPO received overwhelming response with 2.5 times subscription on the first day. The issue closes on November 25.

title: Larsen & Toubro wins Rs 8,000 crore infrastructure order
content: L&T Construction won a major infrastructure order worth Rs 8,000 crore for building expressway connecting two major cities.

title: Bharti Airtel 5G rollout reaches 50 cities
content: Bharti Airtel completed 5G network rollout in 50 cities across India, covering over 30% of the urban population.

title: Gold prices surge to Rs 65,000 per 10 grams
content: Gold prices in India touched a new high of Rs 65,000 per 10 grams driven by global uncertainty and festival season demand.

title: Nifty50 closes at record high of 21,800
content: Indian benchmark index Nifty50 closed at an all-time high of 21,800 supported by strong FII inflows and positive global cues.
